meanings.definition: One who recovers something lost or stolen.
meanings.sent1: The recoverers found the missing necklace in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The recoverers returned the stolen paintings to the museum.
meanings.sent3: The recoverers discovered the hidden treasure under the old oak tree.
meanings.sent4: The recoverers were like detectives solving the mystery of the vanished artifacts.
meanings.sent5: The recoverers' success in finding the lost keys was celebrated by all.

meanings.definition: A person who regains health after an illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: The recoverers at the hospital were happy to be going home.
meanings.sent2: The recoverers slowly regained their strength after the accident.
meanings.sent3: The recoverers joked about their hospital stay once they were feeling better.
meanings.sent4: The recoverers' journey to recovery was like climbing a mountain.
meanings.sent5: The recoverers' determination to heal inspired others in the ward.
